question: Following a near fatal episode of acute pancreatitis caused by a blocked common bile duct, I am now insulin dependent diabetic.  I had a large psuedocyst on my pancreas which had become smaller in Jan. 09 when I had my gall bladder removed.  How long would it take for the psuedocyst to go away and is there a chance my diabetes might resolve itself?  Anyone out there with similar story?
title: pancreatitis induced diabetes
